articles.title: NASA's Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter Spies China's Chang'e 6 Spacecraft on Far Side of the Moon - SciTechDaily
articles.description: NASA's Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter photographed China's Chang'e 6 on the Moon, revealing its location on a crater within the geologically rich Apollo basin, characterized by ancient basaltic flows. NASA’s LRO (Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter) imaged China’s Cha…
articles.content: This image from NASA’s Lunar Reconnaissance Orbiter Camera shows China’s Chang’e 6 in the Apollo basin on the lunar farside on June 7, 2024. The lander is seen as the small cluster of bright pixels i… [+4530 chars]

articles.title: Technology giant Apple scraps its Pay Later loan scheme in US - BBC.com
articles.description: It marks a retreat for the technology giant from plans to offer traditional financial services.
articles.content:
Apple is ending its in-house buy now, pay later scheme in the US, which it launched just last year.
The technology giant says it will now offer customers payment plans through third-party credit and… [+1170 chars]
